data.value:
Think of someone who has been important in your life – someone who saw the seed of greatness in you, and helped you develop your strengths. A parent, teacher, former boss or colleague, a friend or partner. Ask yourself the questions below:

  1. Who was that person in your life? What did they represent?
  2. What types of thing did this person do for you? How did they behave towards you?
  3. How did they help cultivate your strengths?
  • Who was that person in your life? What did they represent?
  • What types of thing did this person do for you? How did they behave towards you?
  • How did they help cultivate your strengths?
